statements: SELECT * FROM ReportData
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM ReportData WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM ReportData WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_id, report_data->'key' AS data_key FROM ReportData WHERE report_data->'key'->>'sub_key' = 'value'
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM ReportData ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ReportData WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM ReportData WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM ReportData ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(report_data->'products') as num_products FROM ReportData WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ReportData WHERE report_data->>'status' = 'completed' AND report_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM Reports WHERE report_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM Visualizations WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Visualizations ORDER BY visualization_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT visualization_name FROM Visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'Pie Chart';
SELECT report_name, visualization_name FROM Reports INNER JOIN Visualizations ON Reports.report_id = Visualizations.report_id;
SELECT visualization_name, report_date FROM Visualizations INNER JOIN Reports ON Visualizations.report_id = Reports.report_id WHERE Reports.report_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM aggregate_data;
SELECT report_name, data_source FROM aggregate_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM report_summary ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_records FROM report_summary WHERE total_records > 1000;
SELECT visualization_name, data_value FROM visualization_data WHERE data_value >= 50.0;
SELECT * FROM aggregate_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_name, data_source FROM aggregate_data WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(total_records) FROM report_summary;
SELECT visualization_name, data_type, data_value FROM visualization_data ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_records FROM report_summary WHERE last_updated < NOW();
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM visualizations ORDER BY visualization_name ASC;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_conn_string FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_type = 'SQL';
SELECT aggregation_name, aggregation_formula FROM aggregations WHERE aggregation_type = 'sum';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT visualization_id, visualization_name, visualization_type FROM visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'chart' AND visualization_data ->> 'x-axis' = 'time';
SELECT aggregation_name, aggregation_formula FROM aggregations WHERE aggregation_type = 'sum';
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'chart';
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_type = 'database' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_name;
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'bar_chart';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type, data_source_connection_string FROM data_sources ORDER BY data_source_name ASC;
